data.name: Sleeping Dogs: Drunken Fist Pack
data.detailed_description: With the Drunken Fist outfit Wei unleashes this exclusive fighting style. While in combat, filling the face meter will enable you to drink from your flask and perform special moves and unique counters. Sway like a drunkard, hit like a mule.
data.about_the_game: With the Drunken Fist outfit Wei unleashes this exclusive fighting style. While in combat, filling the face meter will enable you to drink from your flask and perform special moves and unique counters. Sway like a drunkard, hit like a mule.
data.short_description: With the Drunken Fist outfit Wei unleashes this exclusive fighting style. While in combat, filling the face meter will enable you to drink from your flask and perform special moves and unique counters. Sway like a drunkard, hit like a mule.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS:Windows Vista Service Pack 2, Windows 7
  • Processor:Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 or 11 compatible Nvidia or AMD ATI card, ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or higher
  • DirectX®:10
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS:Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor:Quad-core Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 11 Nvidia or AMD ATI card, Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 or ATI Radeon 6950
  • DirectX®:11
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
